code: import*as types from'../actions/actionTypes';export var listAll=function listAll(){return{type:types.LIST_ALL};};export var saveTask=function saveTask(task){return{type:types.SAVE_TASK,task:task};};export var toggoForm=function toggoForm(task){return{type:types.TOGGO_FORM};};export var closeForm=function closeForm(){return{type:types.CLOSE_FORM};};export var openForm=function openForm(){return{type:types.OPEN_FORM};};export var updateStatus=function updateStatus(id){return{type:types.UPDATE_STATUS_TASK,id:id};};export var deleteTask=function deleteTask(id){return{type:types.DELETE_TASK,id:id};};export var editTask=function editTask(task){return{type:types.EDIT_ITEM,task:task};};export var filterTask=function filterTask(filter){return{type:types.FILTER_TABLE,filter:filter};};export var searchTask=function searchTask(keyword){return{type:types.SEARCH,keyword:keyword};};export var sortTask=function sortTask(sort){return{type:types.SORT,sort:sort};};
